thread.title: Lewis Hamilton backs Nico Rosberg to make stronger challenge in 2016 - Ludlow Advertiser
thread.title_full: Lewis Hamilton backs Nico Rosberg to make stronger challenge in 2016 - Ludlow Advertiser - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Ludlow Advertiser
title: Lewis Hamilton backs Nico Rosberg to make stronger challenge in 2016 - Ludlow Advertiser
text:
Lewis Hamilton expects Nico Rosberg to bounce back after his Formula One World Championship challenge all but ended in Russia on Sunday. Rosberg, who started on pole in Sochi, saw off the challenge from Hamilton on the first lap to lead the opening phase of the race.
 Ludlow Advertiser.
